title: G5 Scholarship exam cut off marks released
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The cut-off marks for Grade 5 Scholarship Examination 2021 have been released.
The Ministry of Education announced that students can check the information they have received about the schools by visiting the Ministry of Education’s website via https://moe.gov.lk/.
